item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-03-10
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Starbucks (Waban) (474 Woodward Street, Waban). #
  • The problem with running a bootstrapped startup is that the day is only 24 hours long. #startup #fictfact #
  • I'm at Whole Foods Market (Newton) (916 Walnut Street, Newton). #
  • This Food Wars show is just idiotic. Must you turn the celebration of 2 great restaurants into a competition? #
  • I'm at Panera Bread (1100 Lexington St., Waltham). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
